message.body: Gurl I was just in last drop and there was someone else there!
Haha yeah!
I spent last Sunday in Virginia w Alec ! And this Sunday I'm at home working from home and applying to jobs in my field :)
￼Last Sunday!
I traded my last drop coworkers for penny the pig and Miley the Yorkie mix
*mikey
Who's company I far prefer!
Fun!!! Do you think you'll be staying in philly?
Hahahaha wait I told you Alec and I are having a baby, right?

I'll still be running the crane gallery space and I'll have ties to Philly and I'll be in Philly for a few months but Alec and I are going to go to Mexico to his family for a few months so we can have the infant there w us bc it'll be warm and his parents gave him a house w a pool lol
So I am just trying to get my stuff in order so that I can work on my book while I'm in Mexico (I have a publisher interested in my graduate thesis which I turned into a book on still life painting)
HOLY SHIT NO YOU DIDNT
￼Check it out! We made a human (an almost human...)
Oh hahahaha yeah!!!
You didn't see my Instagram!??
Hahaha
Omg Alec is so psyched. We are engaged and it is Adorbz.
Lol NO I didn't
He's building a little baby sidecar
For the moped
That is adorable and beautiful and congratulations!!!!
Omg and my baby has honorary moped crew status. They are making it a little vest
Omg it is way too cute actually. I never even wanted a bio kid
But Alec is my fav person of all time and I'm so happy to make a little mini Alec bc he's awesome
Omg omg so cute
I never thought I'd feel that way about someone
Ohhhh my god Ingrid this is so exciting, congratulations again!!
Always been really against bio kids
Told my dad just last year that he'd never have grandkids bc babies were gross and pregnancy was gross
And selfish
And he said when I met the right person I'd change my mind and I told him that was insane bc I had a serious bf and also have Always had serious bfs
But he was so right
This is such an adult moment it's incredible
*grown ups!*
!!! Thanks!!
We are getting married and just doing a little friends and family thing so if we do it in Philly you are obv invited!
I'll let you know!
Also I'll do an a baby shower but I'm making a registry that only accepts gifts of 10 dollar donations
For our camper
lol don't judge us
But we are saving to buy a camper
To travel for a year with the baby for my residency programs and his moped rallies
When we come back from Mexico
Omg we are taking a toddler cross country
Judging you only in the way that this is incredible and you and Alec are both beautiful people and making a really important and incredible decision
Which residency program??
I am applying to adjunct teaching gigs and fellowships and residencies around the country for next year
So anything I get into, we will go to
And his moped crew said they'd let him live rent free on their land
They have moped talley camp grounds across the country
Yes!!!! Ingrid I am literally grinning ear to ear this is so beautiful and plz make a movie abt it
It is kind of like...we are a biker crew rv family except MUCH NeRdIeR
Watch sons of anarchy in preparation
Bc it is ...w like scooters
Lolololol ok!! I will!!
Yayayay come visit us in Mexico bc the house is in Merida and beautiful
Omg YES I'd love to!!! Also you me Rachel and Alec should have dinner or something before you leave!
Pools and pyramids
Actually the cutest part
Is that Alec really wants to be a stay at home dad for first few years and just work nights
And that's what I've always wanted
Adorable
He is like 'oh hell no my baby's not going to daycare, I'm w my baby all day long!'
He is all about fatherhood
I love it! Also Rachel is a doula so if you want!!! She is full of good info
Wait really!!
Yayayayay!!
Dude Alec is such a dork and I love him so much . I got so lucky w him
I came home unexpected one day and caught him in bed reading this
And he was sooooo embarrassed
Let's get dinner soon! Once it is warm, let's do a picnic in a park or something!
Text whenever ☺️☺️
Sounds lovely!!! And yes I was wondering about that picture hahah
That is beyond cool
How many months are you?
Hehehe we keep passing babies and he's like omg That's gonna be us yay!
He wants to get a corgi
So we will have a picnic dinner w you guys and bring our corgi if that's cool!
I'm in my second trimester so I feel really good
I knew for awhile but kept it hidden bc I worked under the table everywhere and didn't want to lose my jobs
Until my lease was up
:) now my rent obligations are done and I'm moving back home to my dads for a few months until we go to Mexico. Also I got my business of ground somewhat
Website still in progress but cards are done and clients have trickled in
www.bonnieonline.com
￼Lololol my family for now! Yayayayayayayay but we need a corgi ASAP
￼This is Alec and I practicing living in a camper last weekend- pretending we had a baby. It was awesome!
Congrats on Bonnie! Love the name
How many of the dogs are yours?
Yeah! Do you think the about page is too political
None lol but we walk them together like they are ours even tho Alec doesn't even work for us anymore, he bartends at bobs happy hour now and works at the mechanic shop
Haha no I love it
And congrats to Alec!! Gahh big things big things
